description: The work calendar entry shall be defined as a calendar entry with a start date and time, a finish date and time, and an entry type.
comment: According to ANSI/ISA-95.00.04-2018 Enterprise-Control System Integration âˆ’ Part 4: Objects and Attributes for - Approved 24 May 2018

contents.name: mapsTo
contents.description: The work calendar definition entry that defines this work calendar entry.

contents.name: isMadeUpOf
contents.description: The work calendar entry(s) makes up part of this work calendar entry as the whole

contents.name: hasValuesOf
contents.description: The work calendar entry property(s) in part defines this work calendar entry.

contents.name: startTime
contents.description: Defines the starting date and time of the work calendar entry.
contents.comment: the spec declared this field 'Start datetime' we renamed as 'Start time' to align with other models in Part2.

contents.name: endTime
contents.description: Defines the finishing date and time of the work calendar entry.
contents.comment: the spec declared this field 'Finish datetime' we renamed as 'end time' to align with other models in Part2.

contents.name: entryType
contents.description: Defines the type of work calendar definition entry. There are no standard entry types defined.
